mapper.delete: delete from style where style_num = #{styleNum} and id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from style order by style_likes desc, style_num desc
select * from style order by style_num desc
select * from style where id = #{id} order by style_date desc
select a.* from style a join style_tag b on a.style_num = b.style_num where b.hash_name = #{hashName} order by style_likes desc, a.style_num desc
select a.style_num, a.id, b.hash_name "styleTag.hash_name", a.style_file, a.style_date, a.style_likes from style a join style_tag b on a.style_num = b.style_num where a.style_num = #{styleNum}
